# 🗺️ Where is Wrappr?

Wrappr is everywhere you go. Specifically, Wrappr is multi-chain (opens new window) and deployed on Ethereum, Arbitrum (including Nova), Optimism, Polygon, Gnosis, Fantom, Avalanche, Binance Smart Chain and Goerli (testnet).

Using CREATE2 (some code magick), all Wrapprs will share the same address on every chain.

Sections in this explainer guide are excerpted from the Paradigm Legal Matrix (opens new window). Please carefully review this guide and linked materials to get the most out of Wrappr.
